display_long_description:
Get behind the wheel and step into the most immersive trucking experience ever created in virtual reality.
In Truck Simulator VR: Pro Driver, you're not just playing a game — you're living the life of a long-haul trucker. Navigate realistic roads, deliver cargo across vast open highways, and manage your rig like a true professional, all from the immersive perspective of the driver's seat in full VR.
Choose from a variety of fully interactive trucks, each modeled with authentic interiors, controls, and handling. Haul freight across dynamic environments featuring changing weather, day-night cycles, and challenging road conditions. Whether you're weaving through tight city streets or cruising the open interstate, every mile delivers realism and intensity.
🚛 Key Features:
Fully immersive VR gameplay – Drive, steer, shift, and look around from the cab in true first-person.
Multiple trucks with realistic interiors, engine sounds, and driving physics.
Expansive maps – Explore open-world highways, towns, and delivery hubs.
Cargo missions – Take on contracts, earn money, and build your trucking reputation.
Dynamic weather and time system – Rain, fog, and night driving add to the challenge.
Customizable controls – Drive your way, using Meta Quest controllers, steering peripherals, or seated play.
Whether you're a casual fan or a hardcore simulation enthusiast, Truck Simulator VR: Pro Driver delivers the authentic, adrenaline-pumping experience of life on the road — all in stunning vir
